Navigate to the 'Settings' menu within the messaging app.
Open the Messages application.
Navigate back to the previous screen.
Click on "Spam & blocked" to view blocked contacts and spam messages.
Click the three-dot menu icon in the upper right corner.
Click on "Help & feedback" to access support resources.
Click the "Size: 1.0" button to open the search help interface.
Enter "555-123-4567" into the search help field.
